ISSUE.TITLE: [CI] EnrichIT testSumDurationByArtist failing

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix listener leak in exchange service (#122417) If we hit the circuit breaker exception before fetching pages, we fail to notify the listener. Closes #122271
